options.name: Free Action : Spellsnipe
options.description: Directly after Channeling a Spell, you spend 1 Power to double the Range of it.

options.name: Free Action : Spellsculpt
options.description: Directly after Channeling a Spell, you spend 1 Power to change the Damage Type to Arcane or any Elemental Damage Type.

options.name: Free Action : Careful Spell
options.description: Directly after Channeling a Line, Area or Cone Spell, you spend 2 Power, causing the Spell to ignores allies until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Free Action : Expanded Spell
options.description: Directly after Channeling a Line, Area or Cone Spell, you spend 2 Power to increase the Radius, Width or Size of the Spell by 2 Units.

options.name: Master of Control
options.description: Any time you use a Free Action from the Control Mage Module to cast a Spell, that Spell automatically becomes charged.
